summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 SABRE 2RT32RKDS TRAILER. WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 35 MPH WITH A VEHICLE ATTACHED, THE TRAILER WOULD CAUSE THE VEHICLE TO PULSATE. THE FAILURE OCCURRED EVERY TIME THE VEHICLE WAS DRIVEN. THE CONTACT CALLED THE DEALER BUT THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO OFFER ANY ASSISTANCE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN.
